document_data.name: Banishment
document_data.mainbody: '''''Banishment''''' was a [[psionic]] science of the [[psychoportation]] [[discipline]] that allowed the [[psionicist]] to ''[[teleport (psionics)|teleport]]'' a creature against their will.
document_data.Effects: The psionicist ''teleported'' the target creature into a pocket dimension and held it there for as long as they continued to expend psychic energy. For this power to work the creature needed to be within {{SI|30|feet|long=yes}} of the psionicist when ''banished''. The creature would return to the same spot where it was standing when the ''banishment'' ended. Creatures capable of traveling to the [[astral plane|astral]] or [[ethereal plane]] had a chance to escape the pocket dimension on their own.

Notable Users.Individuals: * [[Vhondryl]], a psionicist in [[Skullport]] and head of the [[Hall of Mental Splendor]]{{Cite dragon/172/Seeing the Sights in Skullport|12, 14, 88}}
